name: Claude API (Anthropic)
description: Anthropic's powerful AI assistant API. Used as the backbone of our AutonomousCodingAgent for code generation, reasoning, and multi-step task planning.

name: OpenAI API
description: GPT-4 and embedding models used for semantic search, text generation, and AI-powered features across our projects.

name: LangChain
description: Framework for building applications with large language models. Excellent for chaining AI calls, building agents, and managing prompts.

name: Hugging Face
description: The AI community's hub for models, datasets, and spaces. We use it for open-source embedding models and fine-tuned models.

name: Pinecone
description: Managed vector database optimized for AI applications. Powers the semantic search in our VectorSearch Engine project.

name: Docker
description: Container platform that we use for consistent development environments, deployment packaging, and microservices architecture.

name: GitHub Actions
description: CI/CD platform built into GitHub. Used for automated testing, building, and deploying all our projects.

name: Kubernetes
description: Container orchestration platform for managing our production deployments with auto-scaling and high availability.

name: Terraform
description: Infrastructure as Code tool for provisioning and managing cloud resources in a consistent, repeatable way.

name: Vercel
description: Frontend cloud platform for deploying Next.js applications with edge functions, analytics, and seamless GitHub integration.

name: Next.js Documentation
description: Official docs for Next.js App Router, server components, data fetching, and deployment. Essential reading for modern React development.

name: Tailwind CSS Documentation
description: Complete reference for Tailwind CSS utility classes, configuration, and best practices for responsive design.

name: TypeScript Handbook
description: The official TypeScript handbook covering types, interfaces, generics, and advanced TypeScript patterns.

name: Prompt Engineering Guide
description: Comprehensive guide to prompt engineering techniques for getting the best results from large language models.

name: FastAPI Documentation
description: Python's high-performance web framework docs. Used for building the backend APIs in ElsaPerformance and VectorSearch Engine.

name: Shadcn UI
description: Beautifully designed components built with Radix UI and Tailwind CSS. Copy-paste components for fast, accessible UI development.
